parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The new description of the list.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom list, which can be obtained by calling the [ListLists](~~2850217~~) operation.

parameters.name: Items
parameters.description: The items in the updated list. The value is a JSON array.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The new name of the list.
